testcase.name: TC17 kullanici uygun datalarla register olabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "automationUrl" anasayfasinda...............................passed And user sign in linkine tiklar.............................................passed And user Create and account bolumune email adresi girer.....................passed And Create an Account butonuna basar........................................passed And user kisisel bilgilerini ve iletisim bilgilerini girer..................passed And user Register butonuna basar............................................passed Then hesap olustugunu dogrulayin............................................passed
